name: Crown of Greed
description: Forged from avarice and adorned with the regrets of the foolish. Whispers promises of wealth but ensures that every debt is paid… one way or another.

effects.debt: You can purchase items without gold, but your debt accrues interest. Remember: the crown always collects its due.

name: Hollow Heart
description: A heart stripped of warmth, yet refusing to stop beating. It grants resilience, but only through conquest.

effects.resilience: Increases max HP, but you can no longer heal through potions or spells—only by defeating enemies.

name: Poison Talisman
description: A sinister talisman pulsing with toxic energy. Handle with care — unless you like your fingers green.

effects.toxic-curse: Increases damage dealt but also applies a lingering poison to the wearer that reduces health over time.
